mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_DIS_INSTANCE_ARCHIVE_BAK ( ID, ARCHIVE_TASK_ID, ORIGINAL_ID, TASK_NAME, INSTANCE_TYPE, STATUS, EXEC_PARAMETERS, EMAIL, SFTP, MODIFY_DATATIME, CREATE_DATATIME, WORK_DIR, REPORT_NAME,ATTACH_NAME, EXCEPTION_MESSAGE, REPORT_ID, LAST_START_DATETIME, LAST_STOP_DATETIME) VALUES ( #{id}, #{archiveTaskId}, #{originalId}, #{taskName}, #{instanceType}, #{status}, #{execParameters}, #{email}, #{sftp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDataTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createDataTime}, #{workDir}, #{reportName}, #{attachName}, #{exceptionMessage}, #{reportId}, #{lastStartDatetime}, #{lastStopDatetime})
